scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn firebaserc && parcel build src/index.ts --dist-dir lib
scripts.start: yarn build:dev & GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../../service-account.json" firebase functions:config:get > .runtimeconfig.json && GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../../service-account.json" firebase emulators:start & yarn workspace @recap/seeder start:emulate
scripts.start:functions: yarn build:dev && GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../../service-account.json" firebase functions:config:get > .runtimeconfig.json && GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="../../service-account.json" firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.clean: npx rimraf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo lib misc/firebaserc.d.ts misc/firebaserc.d.ts.map misc/firebaserc.js misc/firebaserc.js.map misc/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
